definition[0]: to stop yourself from doing something you want to do
example[0]: Brenda repressed the urge to shout at him.
definition[1]: if someone represses upsetting feelings, memories etc, they do not allow themselves to express or think about them
example[2]: He had long ago repressed the painful memories of his childhood.
definition[2]: to control a group of people by force
example[3]: The police were widely criticized for their role in repressing the protest movement.
